content_html:
The West Indies cricket team for the upcoming T20 series against Nepal has been announced. Cricket West Indies has named a 15-member squad to be led by Captain Akeal Hosein. The series will be played between the two nations later this month.

The West Indies Squad

title: West Indies Squad Announced for T20 Series Against Nepal
